dorms.name: DORMS
description: A PAIR OF COLLEGE FRESHMEN ARE MET WITH A GHOSTLY ADVERSARY AFTER BARGAINING WITH AN ECCENTRIC DRUG DEALER.

'DORMS' IS A HORROR COMEDY SHOT IN BERKELEY CALIFORNIA. WRITER/DIRECTOR AND CURRENT UC BERKELEY STUDENT, ALEX CHANG, PERSONIFIES ACADEMIC ANXIETIES INTO A SLASHER VILLAIN IN THIS COLORFUL PSYCHEDELIC INDUCED ODYSSEY.

winter.name: WINTER
description: IN A POST APOCALYPTIC FUTURE, AN EX SCIENTIST RELIVES THE MEMORIES OF HIS DEAD LOVED ONES.
'WINTER' IS A SILENT SCI-FI DRAMA SHOT IN VARIOUS LOCATIONS IN THE UNITED STATES. WRITER/DIRECTOR, ALEX CHANG, CAPTURES MEMORIES IN A FILMIC STYLE IN THIS AMBIENT AND PERSONAL TALE.
